root.name: Brawl Brothers
root.description: OverviewBrawl Brothers is a beat 'em up developed and published by Jaleco for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System and Wii Virtual Console platforms. The game is the sequel to the SNES game Rival Turf.In Japan, Brawl Brothers is known as Rushing Beat Ran: Fukusei Toshi and in Europe is is known as Brawl Brothers: Rival Turf! 2.The full Japanese version is also contained on the cartridge, and can be accessed and played through the use of a cheat code.

similar_games.game: UFO Kamen Yakisoban: Kettler no Kuroi Inbou
